CodeEditorModel.Text:
'IAG Code behind - Add local subroutines for the IAG.
Private Dim ActualStateValue As Short
Sub OnR
ActualStateValue=MyState.Value
Select Case ActualStateValue Case 1 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Clearing" ColorRectangle=True
Case 2 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Stopped" ColorRectangle=False
Case 3 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Starting" ColorRectangle=True
Case 4 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Idle" ColorRectangle=False
Case 5 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Suspended" ColorRectangle=False
Case 6 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Execute" ColorRectangle=False
Case 7 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Stopping" ColorRectangle=True
Case 8 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Aborting" ColorRectangle=True
Case 9 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Aborted" ColorRectangle=False
Case 10 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Holding" ColorRectangle=True
Case 11 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Held" ColorRectangle=False
Case 12 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="UnHolding" ColorRectangle=True
Case 13 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Suspending" ColorRectangle=True
Case 14 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="UnSuspending" ColorRectangle=True
Case 15 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Resetting" ColorRectangle=True
Case 17 T_Machine_ActualState.Text="Complete" ColorRectangle=False End Select
End Sub
